text:
small announcement: 

i am making a short film.

i'm excited to show it to you.

in short - the cold war between countries racing to create a superintelligence incentivizes speed rather than safety. 

this has me concerned, and you should be too.

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends

user_info.name: Kogs
user_info.description: make great things. | editor for @jakedirado | DMs open
